titleStmt.title: A faithful account of the sickness, death, & burial of Capt. William Bedlow, who dyed August the 20th. and was buried August the 22d. 1680 With many other circumstances thereunto relating. Taken from the testimony of his vvife, and many other of his friends who constantly attended him in his sickness. In a letter from an intelligent person in Bristol, to his friend in London.
titleStmt.author: T. S.
